DOC.brief_summary: - Data are obtained of Emselex in routine treatment of Overactive Bladder. The general objectives are to evaluate the product safety, compatibility, efficacy and patient acceptance.
DOC.brief_title: Post Marketing Surveillance Study on Emselex After Launch in Germany
DOC.criteria: Patients who are treated with Emselex for Overactive Bladder Exclusion criteria are the contraindications as specified in the German product information
